s_synopsis: Long, long ago in the land of Ishmeria, 6 magicians and a dragon were sealed in the gems of the crown Gemfire. With their magic locked inside, the crown held powers to help the people of Ishmeria. But, King Eselred used Gemfire against the people, destroying the towns and fields! In a brave attempt to stop the king, Princess Robyn released the gems from the crown. Now the spell of Gemfire is broken, and Robyn is locked away in a tower! As Prince or Princess of a noble family, capture the gems and unite them with the crown. You must return peace to Ishmeria!
